pullRequest.body:
Basic results stating `Î¼^2` is the indicator function for squarefree natural numbers. This came up during my Selberg sieve project.

```suggestion
theorem moebius_sq_eq_one_of_squarefree {l : â„•} (hl : Squarefree l) : Î¼ l ^ 2 = 1 := by
```
similar to `moebius_eq_zero_of_not_squarefree`.

```suggestion
theorem abs_moebius_eq_one_of_squarefree {l : â„•} (hl : Squarefree l) : |Î¼ l| = 1 := by
```
The first three simp lemmas should not be necessary. (The lhs simplifies to `|0|` via `moebius_eq_zero_of_not_squarefree h`, so `abs_zero` should be sufficient.)
